org.everit.osgi.dev.maven

Class BundleSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.BundleSettings

  • public class BundleSettings
extends Object
    Extra settings for a bundle that will be installed to a specific environment.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Integer startLevel
      The start level of the bundle or if left empty, the framework default startlevel will be used.
      private String symbolicName
      The Bundle-SymbolicName, a required parameter.
      private String version
      The version of the bundle.

    • Constructor Summary

      BundleSettings()

    • Field Detail

      • startLevel

        @Parameter
private Integer startLevel
        The start level of the bundle or if left empty, the framework default startlevel will be used.

      • symbolicName

        @Parameter
private String symbolicName
        The Bundle-SymbolicName, a required parameter.

      • version

        @Parameter
private String version
        The version of the bundle. If left empty, all bundles with the specified symbolic name will be relevant. At the moment only exact values are suppoted, range support may come in a future version if requested by many users.
